name: ParentNode
description: The ParentNode mixin contains methods and properties that are common to all types of Node objects that can have children. It's implemented by Element, Document, and DocumentFragment objects.

members.name: ParentNode.children
members.description: Returns a live HTMLCollection containing all objects of type Element that are children of this ParentNode.

members.name: ParentNode.firstElementChild
members.description: Returns the Element that is the first child of this ParentNode, or null if there is none.

members.name: ParentNode.lastElementChild
members.description: Returns the Element that is the last child of this ParentNode, or null if there is none.

members.name: ParentNode.childElementCount
members.description: Returns an unsigned long giving the amount of children that the object has.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: holds the return value an unsigned long (simply an integer) type.

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: is an object representing a Document, DocumentFragment or Element.

members.name: ParentNode.append()
members.description: Inserts a set of Node objects or DOMString objects after the last child of the ParentNode. DOMString objects are inserted as equivalent Text nodes.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: A set of Node or DOMString objects to insert.

members.name: ParentNode.prepend()
members.description: Inserts a set of Node objects or DOMString objects before the first child of the ParentNode. DOMString objects are inserted as equivalent Text nodes.

parameters.name: nodesToPrepend
parameters.description: One or more nodes to insert before the first child node currently in the ParentNode. Each node can be specified as either a Node object or as a string; strings are inserted as new Text nodes.

members.name: ParentNode.querySelector()
members.description: Returns the first Element with the current element as root that matches the specified group of selectors.

members.name: ParentNode.querySelectorAll()
members.description: Returns a NodeList representing a list of elements with the current element as root that matches the specified group of selectors.
